farmingforblockheads.subtitle.falling: Something falling from a great height
config.farmingforblockheads.title: Farming for Blockheads
config.farmingforblockheads.merchantName: List of names the merchant can have.
config.farmingforblockheads.feedingTroug: The range within animals can be fed by the feeding trough.
The maximum amount of animals (per type) until the feeding trough stops feeding.
config.farmingforblockheads.chickenNestR: The range at which the chicken nest picks up laid eggs.
config.farmingforblockheads.fertilizerBo: The chance to get a bonus crop when using Green Fertilizer.
The chance to get a bonus growth when using Red Fertilizer.
config.farmingforblockheads.fertilizerRe: The chance for Fertilized Farmland to turn back into regular Farmland (per provided bonus).
config.farmingforblockheads.treatMerchan: If true, merchants will be considered babies (on a technical level only), which may resolve exploits based on merchant death loot (like blood)
